entry.title: Friday: Showers. High 11.
entry.summary: Rain showers. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High 11. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of drizzle. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of drizzle early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
